Des_Moines.Des Moines Air National Guard Base:
See: Des Moines International Airport for civil airport information
Des Moines Air National Guard Base is the home base of the Iowa Air National Guard 132nd Wing.


== Overview ==
The 132nd Wing, located at the Des Moines Air National Guard Base, can trace its roots back to February, 1941 with the establishment of the 124th Observation Squadron. The unit at that time had 110 men, 27 officers (15 pilots), and 5 aircraft.
